        public void setMaxNrRetries(int maxNrRetries)
        The default number of retries is 3.
        Parameters:
        maxNrRetries - Max number of times to retry Request on failure due to SocketTimeOutException.

      • send

        public void send(java.net.URL url,
        HttpSender.Method method,
        java.lang.String content,
        HttpSender.Type type)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Posts to a URL.
        Parameters:
        url - URL to which to post.
        content - Map of parameters to post to a URL.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the data cannot be posted.

      • getParamsAsFormString

        public static java.lang.String getParamsAsFormString(java.util.Map<?,?> parameters)
                                              throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Converts a Map of parameters into a URL encoded Sting.
        Parameters:
        parameters - Map of parameters to convert.
        Returns:
        URL encoded String representing the parameters.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if one of the parameters couldn't be converted to UTF-8.
